article.title: Lockheed to Provide Radar Equipment to U.S. and Australian Navies
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Lockheed Martin MS2, Owego, New York, was awarded a firm-fixed-price, sole-source contract with a maximum $23,226,087 for radar equipment. Using military service is Navy. The company also was awarded a maximum $14,210,262 for radar equipment to be provided to the Royal Australian Navy. The Defense Logistics Agency Aviation, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, is the contracting activity for both awards.
